TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 描述传入 对象的 HTTP 请求。

span.span: Describes an incoming HTTP request to an object.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当客户端向由对象处理的统一资源标识符 (URI) 发出请求时 , 会提供一个对象, 其中包含有关发送到客户端的发送方、请求和响应的信息。When a client makes a request to a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) handled by an object, the provides a object that contains information about the sender, the request, and the response that is sent to the client. 属性返回描述请求的对象。 The property returns the object that describes the request. 对象包含有关请求的信息, 例如请求字符串、 字符串和请求正文数据 (请参见属性)。 The object contains information about the request, such as the request string, string, and request body data (see the property). 若要答复请求, 必须使用属性获取关联的响应。To reply to the request, you must get the associated response using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何接收和响应。The following code example demonstrates how to receive and respond to a . [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AcceptTypes As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ AcceptTypes { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端接受的 MIME 类型。

span.span: Gets the MIME types accepted by the client.

value.span: 一个 数组，该数组包含在请求的 标头中指定的类型名称；如果客户端请求不包括 标头，则为 。

span.span: A array that contains the type names specified in the request's header or if the client request did not include an header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标头是空格分隔的多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 类型名称 (例如, `image/jpeg`) 的字符串, 指示客户端准备接受并在响应中处理的 MIME 类型。 `Accept`The `Accept` header is a string of space-separated Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type names (for example, `image/jpeg`), which indicate the MIME types that the client is prepared to accept and process in a response. 该`*/*`条目指示客户端接受任何 MIME 类型。The `*/*` entry indicates that the client accepts any MIME type. 有关`Accept`标头的详细说明, 请参阅 RFC 2616, 网址[https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)为。For a detailed description of the `Accept` header, see RFC 2616, available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). 有关请求标头的完整列表, 请参见枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#15)]

param.name: requestCallback
param.span: 一个 委托，它引用操作完成时要调用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含操作的相关信息。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 操作完成后，此对象会被传递给回叫委托。

span.span: This object is passed to the callback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 开始对客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书的异步请求。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request for the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.
An that indicates the status of the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientCertificateError As Integer
public: property int ClientCertificateError { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个错误代码，该代码标识的问题涉及客户端提供的 。

span.span: Gets an error code that identifies a problem with the provided by the client.

value.span: 包含 Windows 错误代码的 值。

span.span: An value that contains a Windows error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含安全通道 (Schannel) 安全支持提供程序接口 (SSPI) 返回的 Windows 错误代码, 该代码用于验证证书。This property contains a Windows error code returned by the Secure Channel (Schannel) Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI), which is used to validate the certificate. 有关对 Schannel 的 SSPI 支持的详细信息, 请参阅上[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)安全文档中的 "使用 Schannel 创建安全连接"。For more information about SSPI support for Schannel, see "Creating a Secure Connection Using Schannel" in the Security documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查此属性以确定请求是否包含有效的客户端证书。The following code example checks this property to determine whether the request includes a valid client certificate. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#3)]

exception.span: 尚未通过调用 或 方法初始化客户端证书

span.span: The client certificate has not been initialized yet by a call to the or methods
-or -
The operation is still in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentEncoding As Encoding
public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ ContentEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用于随请求发送的数据的内容编码

span.span: Gets the content encoding that can be used with data sent with the request

value.span: 一个 对象，适于 属性中的数据使用。

span.span: An object suitable for use with the data in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可用于将字节序列转换为字符集 (代码页), 并将字符转换为字节序列。An object can be used to convert byte sequences into character sets (code pages) and characters into byte sequences. 此属性使用来自`Content-Type`标头的字符集值来确定编码。This property uses the charset value from the `Content-Type` header to determine the encoding. 如果该信息不可用, 则此属性返回。If that information is not available, this property returns . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentLength64 As Long
public: property long ContentLength64 { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含在请求中的正文数据的长度。

span.span: Gets the length of the body data included in the request.

value.span: 请求的 标头中的值。

span.span: The value from the request's header.

value.span: 如果内容长度未知，则此值为 -1。

span.span: This value is -1 if the content length is not known.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Content-Length`标头表示请求随附的正文数据的长度 (以字节为单位)。The `Content-Length` header expresses the length, in bytes, of the body data that accompanies the request. 有关请求标头的完整列表, 请参见枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在处理正文数据时使用属性。The following code example uses the property while processing body data. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
public: property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取包含在请求中的正文数据的 MIME 类型。

span.span: Gets the MIME type of the body data included in the request.

value.span: ，包含请求的 标头的文本。

span.span: A that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端在请求中包含正文数据, 则会在`Content-Type`标头中声明正文数据的多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 类型。If a client includes body data in a request, it declares the Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type of the body data in the `Content-Type` header. 例如, 使用`POST`方法从 Web 窗体返回的数据的默认 MIME 类型是`application/x-www-form-urlencoded`。For example, the default MIME type of data returned from a Web form using the `POST` method is `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`. 有关请求标头的完整列表, 请参阅 [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)提供的枚举和 RFC 2616。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration and RFC 2616, available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). 如果请求中没有`Content-Type`标头, 则为null。The is null when there is no `Content-Type` header in the request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#16)]

summary.span: 获取随请求发送的 Cookie。

span.span: Gets the cookies sent with the request.

value.span: 包含伴随请求的 Cookie。

span.span: A that contains cookies that accompany the request.

value.span: 如果请求不包含 Cookie，则此属性返回空集合。

span.span: This property returns an empty collection if the request does not contain cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是存储在本地 (客户端) 计算机上的 Web 服务器的名称/值文本数据。A cookie is name/value text data from a Web server that is stored on the local (client) computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示与请求一起发送的 cookie 的值。The following code example displays the values of cookies sent with the request. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 GetClientCertificate() cil managed

summary.span: 检索客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书。

span.span: Retrieves the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其中包含客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书。

span.span: A object that contains the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会一直阻止, 直到检索到证书。This method blocks until the certificate is retrieved.

exception.span: 对此方法的一个调用（以检索客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书）正在进行，因此无法进行对此方法的另一个调用。

span.span: A call to this method to retrieve the client's X.509 v.3 certificate is in progress and therefore another call to this method cannot be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> GetClientCertificateAsync() cil managed
Public Function GetClientCertificateAsync () As Task(Of X509Certificate2)

summary.span: 以异步操作检索客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书。

span.span: Retrieves the client's X.509 v.3 certificate as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性返回包含客户端的 X.509 v.3 证书的 对象。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a object that contains the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 检索到证书后, 将完成返回的对象。The returned object will complete when the certificate has been retrieved. 如果调用此方法以检索客户端的 x.509 的第3个证书, 则无法进行对此方法的另一次调用。If a call to this method to retrieve the client's X.509 v.3 certificate is in progress, then another call to this method cannot be made.

public: property bool HasEntityBody { bool get(); };

span.span: if the request has associated body data; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 使用`POST`方法将数据发送到服务器的请求应具有实体正文。A request that sends data to the server using the `POST` method, for example, should have an entity body. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Headers As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 获取在请求中发送的标头名称/值对的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of header name/value pairs sent in the request.

value.span: 包含的 HTTP 标头包括在请求中。

span.span: A that contains the HTTP headers included in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求标头包含元数据信息。Request headers contain metadata information. 例如, 标头可以包含引用客户端到服务器的资源的统一资源标识符 (URI)、客户端使用的用户代理的标识, 以及响应正文中数据的可接受 MIME 类型。For example, headers can contain the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the resource that referred the client to the server, the identity of the user agent employed by the client, and the acceptable MIME types for data in the response body. 有关请求标头的完整列表, 请参见枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示给定对象中的所有信息。The following code example displays all the information in a given object. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#21)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#21)]

summary.span: 获取由客户端指定的 HTTP 方法。

span.span: Gets the HTTP method specified by the client.

value.span: 包含的方法用于请求中。

span.span: A that contains the method used in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 方法通常获取或发布, 具体取决于客户端所需的操作。The HTTP method is typically GET or POST, depending on the action desired by the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputStream As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ InputStream { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含由客户端发送的正文数据的流。

span.span: Gets a stream that contains the body data sent by the client.

value.span: 一个可读的 对象，该对象包含客户端在请求正文中发送的字节。

span.span: A readable object that contains the bytes sent by the client in the body of the request.

value.span: 如果没有随请求发送任何数据，则此属性返回 。

span.span: This property returns if no data is sent with the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端传输数据 (例如, 使用 HTTP `POST`方法), 则此方法返回的流包含这些数据。If the client transmits data (for example, using the HTTP `POST` method), the stream returned by this method contains that data. > [!NOTE] > 关闭请求不会关闭此属性返回的流。Closing the request does not close the stream returned by this property. 如果不再需要该流, 则应通过调用方法将其关闭。When you no longer need the stream, you should close it by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性来读取与请求一起发送的数据。The following code example demonstrates using this property to read the data sent with a request. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#16)]

para.span: 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

span.span: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: if the request originated on the same computer as the object that provided the request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当请求来自本地计算机时, 应用程序可以使用此属性执行特殊处理。Applications can use this property to perform special processing when requests are from the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示用来发送请求的 TCP 连接是否使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 协议。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the TCP connection used to send the request is using the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol.

value.span: 如果 TCP 连接使用的是 SSL，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the TCP connection is using SSL; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要请求安全连接, 客户端请求将使用而不是。To request a secure connection, the client request uses instead of . 如果无法使用 SSL 建立连接, 则客户端将收到一个提供有关错误的信息的。If the connection cannot be established using SSL, the client receives a that provides information about the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeepAlive As Boolean
public: property bool KeepAlive { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示客户端是否请求持久性连接。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the client requests a persistent connection.

value.span: 如果连接应保持打开状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection should be kept open; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 客户端和服务器需要在短时间内多次交换数据, 则持久性连接会使其通信速度提高, 因为这样可以避免为每个消息打开和关闭 TCP 连接所需的开销。If an HTTP client and server expect to exchange data multiple times in a short time period, a persistent connection speeds up their communications by allowing them to avoid the overhead required to open and close a TCP connection for each message. 对于使用 HTTP/1.1 的客户端, 此属性的默认值`true`为。For clients using HTTP/1.1, the default value for this property is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalEndPoint As IPEndPoint
public: property System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ LocalEndPoint { System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取请求定向到的服务器 IP 地址和端口号。

span.span: Gets the server IP address and port number to which the request is directed.

value.span: 表示请求被发送到的 IP 地址。

span.span: An that represents the IP address that the request is sent to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你希望根据请求的处理方式来响应请求时, 此属性很有用。This property is useful when you want to respond to requests based on the way they are addressed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. summary.span: 获取请求客户端使用的 HTTP 版本。

span.span: Gets the HTTP version used by the requesting client.

value.span: 用于标识 HTTP 的客户端版本。

span.span: A that identifies the client's version of HTTP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同 HTTP 版本的功能在中的可用[https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)文档中指定。The capabilities of different HTTP versions are specified in the documents available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property QueryString As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 获取包含在请求中的查询字符串。

span.span: Gets the query string included in the request.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含的查询数据包括在请求 中。

span.span: A object that contains the query data included in the request .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 URL 中, 查询信息是由问号 (？) 分隔的。In a URL, the query information is separated from the path information by a question mark (?). 名称/值对由等号 (=) 分隔。Name/value pairs are separated by an equals sign (=). 若要以单个字符串的形式访问查询数据, 请 从返回的对象中获取属性值。To access the query data as a single string, get the property value from the object returned by . > [!NOTE] > 不带等号的查询 (示例[http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name](http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name) :) 会添加到`null`中的键。Queries without an equal sign (example: [http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name](http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name) ) are added to the `null` key in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#15)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取客户端请求的 URL 信息（不包括主机和端口）。

span.span: Gets the URL information (without the host and port) requested by the client.

value.span: 包含此请求的原始 URL。

span.span: A that contains the raw URL for this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 原始 URL 定义为后面包含域信息的 URL 部分。The raw URL is defined as the part of the URL following the domain information. 在 url 字符串`http://www.contoso.com/articles/recent.aspx`中, 原始 URL 是`/articles/recent.aspx`。In the URL string `http://www.contoso.com/articles/recent.aspx`, the raw URL is `/articles/recent.aspx`. 原始 URL 包括查询字符串 (如果存在)。The raw URL includes the query string, if present. 若要获取主机和端口信息, 请使用属性。To obtain the host and port information, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#11)]

summary.span: 获取客户端通过请求发送的服务提供程序名称 (SPN)。

span.span: Gets the Service Provider Name (SPN) that the client sent on the request.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含客户端通过请求发送的 SPN。

span.span: A that contains the SPN the client sent on the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用属性来执行自定义服务提供名称 (SPN) 验证。An application could use the property to perform custom Service Provide Name (SPN) validation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TransportContext As TransportContext
public: property System::Net::TransportContext ^ TransportContext { System::Net::TransportContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端请求的 。

span.span: Gets the for the client request.

value.span: 客户端请求的 对象。

span.span: A object for the client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于检索使用 HTTPS 发送的通道绑定令牌 (CBT) 。 The property can be used to retrieve the channel binding token (CBT) for an which was sent using HTTPS. 应用程序可以使用属性, 通过调用本机 Win32 [AcceptSecurityContext](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=147021)函数来执行自定义身份验证。An application could use the property to perform custom authentication using calls to the native Win32 [AcceptSecurityContext](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=147021) function. 如果应用程序尝试使用 方法从此属性检索通道绑定令牌 (CBT), 则将引发。 If an application attempts to retrieve the channel binding token (CBT) from this property using the method and the is not , then the will throw . 使用内部实现 替代方法。The overrides the method with an internal implementation.

related.span: 带有扩展保护的集成 Windows 身份验证

span.span: Integrated Windows Authentication with Extended Protection

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Url As Uri
public: property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取客户端请求的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object requested by the client.

value.span: 一个 对象，用于标识客户端请求的资源。

span.span: A object that identifies the resource requested by the client.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性允许您获取对象中提供的所有信息。 The property allows you to obtain all the information available from a object. 如果只需要知道 URI 请求的原始文本, 请考虑改用属性。If you need to know only the raw text of the URI request, consider using the property instead. 如果未能分析来自客户端的, 则属性为null。The property is null if the from the client could not be parsed. 属性指示是否使用原始非转义 uri 而不是转换的 uri (其中任何百分比编码值都已转换) 以及执行其他规范化步骤。 The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 当某个实例通过该`http.sys`服务收到请求时, 它将创建由`http.sys`提供的 URI 字符串的实例, 并将其公开为属性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服务公开两个请求 URI 字符串:The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 原始 URIRaw URI - 转换的 URIConverted URI 原始 URI 是在 HTTP 请求的请求行中提供的:The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` `http.sys`为上述请求提供的原始 URI 为 "/path/"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 这表示 HTTP 谓词后的字符串, 因为它是通过网络发送的。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. 该`http.sys`服务使用 HTTP 请求行中提供的 uri 和主机标头来确定请求应转发到的源服务器, 从请求中提供的信息创建转换的 uri。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 这是通过将请求中的信息与一组已注册的 URI 前缀进行比较来完成的。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. 为了能够比较这些值, 需要对请求进行一些规范化。In order to be able to compare those values, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 对于上面的示例, 转换后的 URI 如下所示:For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` 服务将属性值和请求行中的字符串结合起来, 以创建转换的 URI。 `http.sys`The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 此外, `http.sys` 类还会执行以下操作:In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消转义所有百分比编码值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 将百分号编码的非 ASCII 字符转换为 UTF-16 字符表示形式。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 请注意, 支持 UTF-8 和 ANSI/DBCS 字符以及 Unicode 字符 (使用% uXXXX 格式的 Unicode 编码)。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 执行其他规范化步骤, 如路径压缩。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 由于请求不包含任何有关用于百分比编码值的编码的信息, 因此只需分析百分比编码的值就不能确定正确的编码。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此`http.sys` , 提供了两个用于修改进程的注册表项:Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |注册表项Registry Key|默认值Default Value|说明Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果为零`http.sys` , 则只接受 utf-8 编码的 url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果非零, `http.sys`则还接受请求中 ANSI 编码或 DBCS 编码的 url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果非零, `http.sys`则始终首先尝试将 URL 解码为 utf-8; 如果该转换失败并且 EnableNonUTF8 为非零, 则 http.sys 会尝试将其解码为 ANSI 或 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果为零 (并且 EnableNonUTF8 为非零), `http.sys`则尝试将它解码为 ANSI 或 DBCS; 如果不成功, 则它将尝试 utf-8 转换。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 当收到请求时, 它将使用转换后的`http.sys` URI 作为属性的输入。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 除了 Uri 中的字符和数字以外, 还需要支持字符。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 例如, 以下 URI 用于检索客户编号 "1/3812" 的客户信息:An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 请注意 Uri (% 2F) 中的百分号编码的斜杠。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 这是必需的, 因为在这种情况下, 斜杠字符表示数据而不是路径分隔符。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 将字符串传递到 Uri 构造函数将导致以下 URI:Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 将路径拆分为其段将导致以下元素:Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 这不是请求发送方的意图。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果该 `http.sys` 属性设置为 false, 则当收到请求时, 它将使用原始 URI, 而不是转换的 uri 作为属性的输入。 If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#15)]

<httpListener> Element (Network Settings)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UrlReferrer As Uri
public: property Uri ^ UrlReferrer { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取将使客户端与服务器相关的资源的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the resource that referred the client to the server.

value.span: 对象，包含请求的 标头的文本；如果请求中不包含标头，则为 。

span.span: A object that contains the text of the request's header, or if the header was not included in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端已跟随指向所请求 URI 的超链接, 则其请求可能`Referrer`包含一个标头, 该标头标识包含超链接的资源的 URI。If a client has followed a hyperlink to the requested URI, its request might contain a `Referrer` header that identifies the URI of the resource that contained the hyperlink. 客户端可以伪造或选择不显示标头。Clients can falsify or choose not to present a header. 因此, 虽然属性可用于识别 Web 流量中的基本趋势, 但不应将其用作授权方案的一部分来控制对数据的访问。Therefore, while the property can be useful for identifying basic trends in Web traffic; you should not use it as part of an authorization scheme to control access to data. 有关请求标头的完整列表, 请参见枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. 如果请求中没有`Referrer`标头, 或者`Referrer`标头出现在请求中但未分析为有效, 则为null。The is null when there is no `Referrer` header in the request or when the `Referrer` header is present in the request but does not parse to a valid . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#15)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取客户端提供的用户代理。

span.span: Gets the user agent presented by the client.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含请求的 标头的文本。

span.span: A object that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `User-Agent`标头通常包含文本, 用于标识用于生成请求的软件的名称和版本号。The `User-Agent` header typically contains text that identifies the name and version number of the software used to generate the request. 有关请求标头的完整列表, 请参见枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. 如果请求中没有`User-Agent`标头, 则为null。The is null when there is no `User-Agent` header in the request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#15)]

value.span: 包含主机地址信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the host address information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的信息也可在属性值中使用。The information returned by this property is also available in the property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#15)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取由客户端指定的 DNS 名称和端口号（如果提供了端口号）。

span.span: Gets the DNS name and, if provided, the port number specified by the client.

value.span: 一个 值，其中包含请求的 标头的文本。

span.span: A value that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标头包含请求的服务器主机名和端口号 (如果已指定`www.contoso.com:8080`), 并以冒号分隔 (例如)。 `Host`The `Host` header contains the requested server host name and port number, if specified, separated by a colon (for example, `www.contoso.com:8080`). 您可以使用此属性根据请求中指定的主机名返回不同的响应。You can use this property to return different responses depending on the host name specified in the request. 有关请求标头的完整列表, 请参见枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserLanguages As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ UserLanguages { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取响应的首选自然语言。

span.span: Gets the natural languages that are preferred for the response.

value.span: 数组，包含请求的 标头中指定的语言；如果客户端请求不包含 标头，则为 。

span.span: A array that contains the languages specified in the request's header or if the client request did not include an header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关`Accept-Language`标头的详细说明, 请参阅 RFC 2616 第14.4 节, 网址[https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)为。For a detailed description of the `Accept-Language` header, see RFC 2616 Section 14.4, available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). 有关请求标头的完整列表, 请参见枚举。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示请求的`Accept-Language`标头中的语言。The following code example displays the languages from the request's `Accept-Language` header. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#15)]
